channel.title: Go on mfridman.com
channel.description: Recent content in Go on mfridman.com

item.title: NATS core: an always available dial-tone - part 1
item.description: performance and simplicity simplicity buys you opportunity consice feature set no built-in persistence of messages no exactly-once-delivery promises fastest, simplest, and most reliable way of writing and reading to a socket to communicate with N nodes (1 to 1 or 1 to many) Design: - TCP/IP based - pure pub/sub - plain text protocol - fire and forget .

item.title: Welcome, Go modules - part2
item.description: Go modules: part 1, part 2, part 3 Go module GOPATH mode vs module-aware mode go.mod file Day-to-day commands upgrading downgrading excluding version remove exclusion replace dropping replacement updating and patching Advanced commands Go module A go module is a collection of related Go packages. A single unit that defines the minimum requirements that must be satisfied by their dependencies.

item.title: Welcome, Go modules - part1
